ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: That is generally true, although the damage bonus does not become too significant until higher levels.  At level 32 in your case, you should switch slots.  By
ygData.messageBody:
That is generally true, although the damage bonus does not become too
significant until higher levels. At level 32 in your case, you should
switch slots. By the time you get high enough level where damage bonus
is significant, you will have a better fast weapon than your Sainy's
Claw.

Shada

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Finger [mailto:mike_finger@...]
Sent: Friday, November 30, 2001 9:18 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapons


I have always heard (my bro is a ranger and follows the ranger board
closely) that you want your fastest weapon in your primary to be able to
get
your damage bonus as often as possible and that in your secondary slow
ratio
is what you want to follow (as your secondary does not get damage
bonus).

I'm using a 6/19 in primary (Sainy's claw) and a 13/26 (Flameweaver) in
secondary.

My 2 cp, as well.

Notebender
Bard of the 32nd song
Veeshan
